name: Roll It
overview: Another cool release by Markt & Technik, this one a puzzler in which you must get your ball to the exit whilst collecting diamonds. The coloured arrows move the second ball that must be pocketed first. Created in 1990 by Markus Rath and published in 64'er 1990/09, in 64'er Sonderheft 73, and in 64'er 1999/03.
